Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens N Latex FLC kappa and lambda assays for quantitative measurement of free light chains in serum and EDTA-plasma using immunonephelometry
Indications for Use Summary: In-vitro diagnostic reagents for quantitative determination of free kappa or lambda light chains in human serum and EDTA-plasma by immunonephelometry using BN Systems, aiding in diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma and amyloidosis in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings.
